name: The Adventures of Mr. Tiki Man
name_original: The Adventures of Mr. Tiki Man
description:
The Adventures of Mr. Tiki Man

Press left and right arrow keys to move left and right.

Press spacebar to jump.

Game assets, art, and tutorials provided by:

Free Platform Game Assets by Bayat Games

Pixel Adventure 1 by Pixel Frog

 Background Art – chimeraspeaks at wordpress 

 Tutorial for Player Controller - “[Unity] Creating a 2D Platformer (E01. Set-up)” by Sebastian Lague

 Tutorial for Player Respawn System – “Player Respawn – 2D Game Development With Unity” by BurgZerg Arcade

 Tutorial for Platform “Ride” System – “Unity 2D Tutorial How To Create Moving Platform That Character Can Ride In Simple Platformer Game” by Alexander Zotov
